LightningComponentBundle.description: Fully flexibly record banner. Can be used on any record detail page.

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: if component is used on record detail page set this to "{!recordId}"

property.name: authorImageField
property.label: Author Image Field Api Name
property.description: Accepts rich text & url field types. If left blank, the banner will pull the profile image of the record creator

property.name: backgroundColor
property.label: Background Color
property.description: RGB color code

property.name: categoryField
property.label: Catgeory Field Api Name
property.description: Shows in learn more pop-up

property.name: imageField
property.label: Image Field Api Name
property.description: Accepts rich text & url field types

property.name: learnMoreField
property.label: Long Description Field Api Name
property.description: Shows in learn more pop-up

property.name: metricsChildObjectApiName
property.label: Metrics Counter - Child Object Api Name
property.description: If specified, a counter shows with child records related to this record

property.name: metricsLookupFieldApiName
property.label: Metrics Counter - Lookup Field Api Name
property.description: The field api name of the field on the child object that looks up to this record

property.name: statusField
property.label: Stage Field Api Name
property.description: Value shows in countdown, once countdown has ended.

property.name: textColor
property.label: Text Color
property.description: RGB value. Defaults to Community text color. Doesn't override rich text.

property.name: videoFileId
property.label: Video File Id
property.description: If specified video player will show in "Learn More" modal

property.name: videoFileIdField
property.label: Video File Id Field Api Name
property.description: If specified video player will show in "Learn More" modal

property.name: videoUrl
property.label: Video Url
property.description: If specified video player will show in "Learn More" modal. Supported sources are YouTube, Vimeo and Google Drive

property.name: videoUrlField
property.label: Video Url Field Api Name
property.description: If specified video player will show in "Learn More" modal
